idea:
Suryashakthi Product specializes in the design and installation of Solar PV based power plants, Solar Hot Water Systems, roof mounted arrays and off grid solutions around the world, using the latest and best Solar technology available, ensuring it to be the most efficient and cost-effective solar solution.

Suryashakthi Product design knowledge and project development expertise is changing the way people perceive Solar power: a highly efficient, scalable, and cost-effective approach to harnessing the sun’s energy for clean power generation. We believe in building affordable and sustainable Solar power facilities that deliver clean dependable power and economic development to communities around the world.

Suryashakthi Product is responsible for plant design, materials procurement, balance of system (BOS) selection and integration, and complete construction for the Solar PV power plants and Solar Hot Water Systems. The EPC process encompasses site selection, permitting, construction, and finally turning over the Solar project to the project promoters.

 Our team has a strong foundation in

· Resource Assessment · Civil and Structural works

· Solar Photo-Voltaic System supply · Power plant implementation & Project

· BOS supply chain · Performance Monitoring systems

· Complete systems design · Allotments and contract requirements
name: suryashakthi Product

idea: A place to create an environment/community for artists, freelancers by upscaling their talent and marrying the same with work and opportunities.
name: Artist Village

idea:
Social Media has become a necessity of the common man however its just timepass & entertainment stuff. No-one is earning a single penny out of it.


I'm developing a Social Media app where Customers will save money & offline  Merchants / Service Providers will grow their businesses and have access to sufficient manpower whenever required.


Its a Mega Social Media App with 574 Individual screens and has its own Business Directory, Jobs Directory (Both White & Blue-Collar) & Dual Chat Applications integrated in it. The Platform brings all Users, Offline Merchants & Service Providers across all industries under one roof.


It is also an attempt to Organize the Un-Organized Sector and a possible replacement to Facebook & Instagram.
name: VETRAV PRIVATE LIMITED
